Hello!

I'm Tope Aanu

About Me

Hello, I'm Tope Fasasi, an enthusiastic front-end developer with a passion for solving technical problems and writing clean, efficient code. I am proficient in HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Git, and GitHub, and currently learning JavaScript. I believe in competence, continuous learning, and building. "Leave me with the code" is my motto (Haha). I am open to mentorship, collaboration with like-minded individuals, and building strong relationships within the tech community. As you continue reading, you will learn more about me and my experience.

  • Name: Tope Fasasi
  • Phone: (+234) 814 720 2316
  • Email: topefasasi99@gmail.com
  • Address: Port Harcourt, Rivers, Nigeria
  • Date Of Birth: 9 September 1999
